definition: to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops

sentences.english: The idea of bringing revolution to the countryside had turned out to be a fantasy.
sentences.chinese: 改造農村的革命理想成了虛妄的幻想。

sentences.english: Finally, an application example of excavator design was proposed to illuminate the reconstruction of traditional functions.
sentences.chinese: 最後，以挖掘機設計目標爲例，進行了函數改造說明。

sentences.english: China builds the Bird's Nest, while Hong Kong renovates the racecourse.
sentences.chinese: 中國建造鳥巢，香港改造馬場。

sentences.english: The script refers to this single-man walker as a modified scout walker.
sentences.chinese: 劇本稱這種單人步行機爲改造過的探察步行機。

sentences.english: In this technologies rebuild, I take charge mostly stem production line design.
sentences.chinese: 在技術改造中，我主要負責對梗線生產段進行設計。

sentences.english: Discussed the rebuilding and application of an automobile redirector rack automatic straightening machine.

sentences.english: These changes will cost money, but they should be cheaper than decarbonization.
sentences.chinese: 升級改造需要資金，但這要比脫碳費用低。

sentences.english: Clearly Liuzhou needs to fill a sizable gap, including rebuilding and upgrading existing public toilets.
sentences.chinese: 因此，柳州需要進行公廁的重建和改造。

sentences.english: The nation's cultural relics chief is opposed to the blind reconstruction of old city towns.
sentences.chinese: 國家文物局局長反對盲目改造舊城。

sentences.english: It is anything but easy to remould a lady of easy virtue.
sentences.chinese: 要改造一個不正經的女人，並非易事。

sentences.english: This topic from fibreglass plant transformation projects of Jiujiang Changjiang fiberglass factory.
sentences.chinese: 本次課題來源於九江長江玻璃纖維廠改造工程。

sentences.english: You don't always have to go with expensive Remodels Kitchen .
sentences.chinese: 您總是不必須去與昂貴改造廚房。

sentences.english: The characteristics of the dry system after remoulding was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了改造後的微波乾燥系統的特點。

sentences.english: But modifying patients' immune cells might be the next best thing.
sentences.chinese: 但或許能退而求其次，改造患者的免疫細胞。

sentences.english: Spherification, where liquid is reshaped into a sphere whose "skin" is a gelled form of the liquid
sentences.chinese: 將流體改造成一種“皮膚”如液體形式的球體。

sentences.english: I recommend finding a gentler sulfate free shampoo and a reconstructive treatment mask.
sentences.chinese: 我需要發現一種溫和免洗方法和一個改造的治療罩。
